channel.title: Abhishek Shree
channel.description: I am an undergraduate at Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur. Also I try to blog about the amazing stuff I come across.

item.title: About vim and building a basic .vimrc
item.description: This is a blog about vim and what a basic vimrc should contain, also a reminder for me on how I set up my .vimrc
item.author: abhishek.shree@outlook.com (Abhishek Shree)
